m_szDocTitle: Elio Motors: Another Solution For Greener Transport
m_szDocSumamry: Elio Motors: Another Solution For Greener Transport December 15th, 2014 by James Ayre   Gas prices are falling. As of this writing, the average price of gas in the United States is below $3 per gallon. That’s likely good news for most people’s bank accounts. But, what might it mean for the environment? After all, when fuel price goes down, SUV, pickup truck, and minivan sales go up. Consider some of the sales gains for several large vehicles in October: Lincoln Navigator sales were up by 38% GMC Sierra sales jumped 12.5% Ram pickup sales were up 33%. Meanwhile, the Ford C-Max Hybrid saw sales
